title: Rise of middle class affects family - gender roles

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the ways in which the rise of the middle class affected family structure and gender roles in Europe in the 1800s.

frqParts.text:

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the ways in which the rise of the middle class affected family structure and gender roles in Europe in the 1800s.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
